alert.note: Alert for Mahnomen; Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:06PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Norman and northwestern Mahnomen Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 406 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Flaming, or 45 miles northeast of Fargo, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mahnomen, Twin Valley, Gary, Bejou, Flom, Beaulieu and Faith. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
